AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description:
Guangzhou Areafly Solar Technology Co., Ltd. has engaged in research, sustained development and efficient production of high-quality solar lighting, batteries,solar inverters,solar energy systems for over 12 Years,with headquarer in Guangzhou,China.

Areafly Solar owns a factory with nearly 5,000 square meters, more than 100 skillful employees and 8 R&D staff, and 8 production lines with a capacity of 100K pieces per month.

We have mold workshop, die casting machine, finishing workshop, assembly line and variety testing equipment, all of our products must be testing each of products to ensure our customers receive high quality products.Our goal has been to make our products qualified, safe, energy-saving and eco-friendly.
AboutPage.description2:
Areafly Solar's products have been well-sold in more than 200 countries. Our mission is tryingour best to solve the problem of electricity shortages in the world, and contribute to the realization of the goal of "carbon neutrality".

In the future, Guangzhou Areafly Solar Technology Co., Ltd.will adhere to the mission of shining the world with green power,and strive to build the company into a trustworhy green energy products and solutions provider.

Achieve "Higher Quality, Better Innovation,Superior Service."

Your attention makes my motivation!

Video.content:
Solar energy application products and solution provider

Guangzhou Areafly Solar Technology Co., Ltd. has been engaged in research, continuous development, and efficient production of high-quality solar inverters, batteries, solar lightings, solar water pumps and solar energy systems for over 12 years.

Areafly Solar operates a factory covering nearly 5,000 square meters, with more than 100 skilled employees, 8 R&D engineers, and 8 production lines capable of producing up to 100,000 units per month. Every product undergoes strict testing to ensure our customers receive reliable, high-quality solutions.

Areafly Solar's products have been sold in more than 200 countries worldwide. Our mission is to help solve global electricity shortages and contribute to achieving the goal of carbon neutrality.
